pullRequest.title: Fix error while fetching multiple molecular profile samples
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix #7299
sometimes the response from mysql is not in the expected order defined at 
  
    
      cbioportal/persistence/persistence-mybatis/src/main/resources/org/cbioportal/persistence/mybatis/MolecularDataMapper.xml
    
    
         Line 38
      in
      2ffc5a0
    
    
    
    

        
          
           ORDER BY REPLACE(genetic_profile.STABLE_ID, '_', ' '), genetic_profile.STABLE_ID ASC 
        
    
  


Instead of relying on response order its better to send molecular profile id in the response

nodes.bodyText: here is where we were relying on order yes?
Maybe check for commaSeparatedSampleIds == null here to.

I've noticed many(maybe all?) places in the code where you convert List<MolecularProfileSamples> to Map<String, MolecularProfileSamples>.  Maybe the signature should be updated to support the return of a Map?

commit.message: Fix error while fetching multiple molecular profile samples

beforeCommit.message: Fix error while fetching multiple molecular profile samples

afterCommit.message: Fix error while fetching multiple molecular profile samples
